to.sven.androidrccar.common.logic.handler

Interface IMessageHandler<T extends Message>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The concrete Message type, that is handled by the implementor.

    public interface IMessageHandler<T extends Message>
    A IMessageHandler handles received messages to a concrete Message type. Note: The implementors of this interface must have an constructor that accept an implementor of AbstractLogic as only parameter.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<T> getMessageType()
      Get the Class of the concrete Message type.

      Handle a received message.
